DirectoryManagement.CreateNewFolder: Enter a folder name to create.
DirectoryManagement.Title: Directory

PermissionCodeDetail.FullControl: Add, read, edit, delete, run program files, edit content, properties, permissions, and take ownership of folders or files in folders.
PermissionCodeDetail.Modify: Allow adding, reading, editing, deleting, running program files, editing content, folder properties or files in folders.
PermissionCodeDetail.ReadAndExecute: Lets list the contents of a folder (subfolder or file), run the program file, read the content, properties, owner, folder permissions or files in the folder.
PermissionCodeDetail.Read: Lets list the contents of a folder (subfolder or file), read the content, attributes, owners, permissions of the folder or files in the folder.
PermissionCodeDetail.Write: Allow adding, modifying content, folder properties or files in folders.
PermissionCodeDetail.ListFolderContents: Lets list the contents of a folder (subfolder or file), read the content, properties, owners, and permissions of the folder.
